segments.text: What kind of music do you enjoy listening to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I enjoy listening to all kinds of music .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like to listen to Rock and R & B .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you like that type of music ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like the kinds of instruments that they use .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that's an excellent reason to like something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , I feel the same way .
segments.speaker: S2
